entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 08 January 2023
